<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/default/banks/{bank_id}/entities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List all entities (people, organizations, etc.) known by the bank, ordered by mention count.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
